channel.title: Primes on Warframe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Primes on Warframe Blog

item.title: How To Get Redeemer Prime
item.description: Hey guys. And the Mesa Prime along with Akjagara Prime and Rede﻿emer Prime﻿ have arrived in Warframe. Today I’ll be showing you which relics you’ll need to farm to get Redeemer Prime and where you can farm these relics.
